duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise and ensure that every guest receives the fastest and most pleasant checkout experience possible through consistent execution of company's Guest Service Standards and Policies.
Maintain front end standards detailed in the No Noticeable Wait Policy at all times.
Manage guest traffic flow from both the guest side and bagging side of the register, using this positioning as an opportunity to interact with guests and monitor productivity.
Train cashiers to call additional hosts to the front end as dictated by guest needs and established daily call-up list.
Handle guest and host requests, refunds, overrides, and check approvals promptly and professionally.
Ensure front end is clean, neat, and clutter free at all times and that the parking lot is free of debris and excessive carts.
Provide training and direction to hosts not meeting the front end standards.
Communicate problem areas and hosts not meeting performance standards to management.
Process guest orders, perform as a cashier or guest service clerk, and perform all other duties as assigned by management.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (Associate's degree preferred)
